description: Police say they were called to a West Yorkshire village where a man was found with stab wounds.
title: Man stabbed in 'attempted murder' in Almondbury, police say
title_page: Man stabbed in 'attempted murder' in Almondbury, police say - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been taken to hospital after he was found inside a vehicle with multiple stab wounds.
The man was found at about 04:50 GMT on Saturday in Almondbury, near Huddersfield, and was taken to hospital where he was in a stable condition, according to West Yorkshire Police.
A scene remained in place on Almondbury Bank on Saturday afternoon and a police spokesperson said the force was treating the incident as an attempted murder.
Police said officers had attended the area a short time before the incident after reports of a concern for safety and had taken a woman to a place of safety.
